name: E. Jeff and Permutation
statement:
Jeff’s friends know full well that the boy likes to get sequences and
arrays for his birthday. Thus, Jeff got sequence for his birthday.Jeff
hates inversions in sequences. An inversion in sequence is a pair of
indexes , such that an inequality holds.Jeff can multiply some numbers
of the sequence by -1. At that, he wants the number of inversions in the
sequence to be minimum. Help Jeff and find the minimum number of
inversions he manages to get.
